translation:
Piratini, November 19, 1838.

Most Illustrious Sir

The government commands that Your Lordship

God keep Your Lordship Domingos José de Almeida Most Illustrious Sir Inácio José de Oliveira Guimarães General Commander of Police of Boqueirão

Official letter of the Most Excellent November 19, received on the 24th of the same month and replied on December 13. Secretariat of the Presidency of the Republic

To the citizen Inácio José de Oliveira Guimarães. Chief of Police of Boqueirão. From the Ministry of the Interior, Finance and Justice.

Printed Copy.
